title: Peter Griffin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you can say "Hey Lois, remember that time I [performed action]?" up to one time. The next night, you will be in Cutaway Gag mode, and gain one charge of the ability you referenced in the day chat.
- You can only refer to actions that you would be able to do as another role.
- Each cutaway gag must be unique, and can't do the same ability as before.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cutaway gags can only last for one night. Saying "Hey Lois, remember that time I gained permanent powerful defense?" is invalid due to its permanent nature. Status effects like Poisoned which are temporary still work.
- Cutaway gags which refer to a certain player must target that player. "Hey Lois, remember that time I shot Zerosage?" will require Zerosage to be the target of your attack tonight.
- If you don't refer to a specific player, your targets are random.
- You can't perform actions that are too strong as dictated by host. For example, you can't become a fully level juggernaut for a night or pestilence.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Tell 4 cutaway gags that come true the next night
